name: Present Detector
description:
In this game there are presents everywhere, but one of them has coal inside it. To stop a child from receiving such horrible gift, you must open it up. But make sure you don't open up the wrong present, or all of christmas will be ruined!

Use your mouse and click to open up the present.

Hover over a present and press space/enter to scan the present

Click on a battery to recharge power
